description:
Strauss Paul Sauer 00-25 spans all millennium vintages through to the 2025 release. The 66-bottle lot includes single bottles from 2000-2017 with a 6-bottle case from 2018-2025. Paul Sauer is Kanonkop’s internationally acclaimed, long-aging Bordeaux blend and was named after its former owner. Multiple IWSC producer of the year winner, and NFT also Includes the Tim Atkin 100-point 2015 vintage. Estimates at R150,000-R250,000 (£8-£13k)

The wines will be cellared at Wine Cellar (Professional wine storage, Cape Town) vintage cellar until maturity (estimated 2028) or withdrawal.
name: Strauss & Co Kanonkop Paul Sauer 2000 - 2025
